template1.pptx: A PowerPoint presentation with 8 slides, contains animations and transitions. This PowerPoint presentation has pictures.
template2.pptx: A PowerPoint presentation with 7 slides, no animations or transitions. This PowerPoint presentation has pictures, tables (slide 3) and charts (slide 4). It even has SmartArt elements (slide 5 and 6).
template3.pptx: A PowerPoint presentation with 9 slides, contains animations in some slides, no transitions.
template4.pptx: A PowerPoint presentation with only one slide, no animations or transitions. This PowerPoint presentation contains a log of pictures and text boxes.
template5.pptx: A PowerPoint presentation with 6 slides, contains animations and transitions. This PowerPoint presentation has pictures and math equations (slide 5).
template6.pptx: A completely empty PowerPoint presentation with only one empty slide. Suitable for adding or inserting content.
